      • setSearchDepth

        public NegamaxSearch.Builder setSearchDepth(int searchDepth)
        Parameters:
        searchDepth - Depth to search to before evaluating nodes in the search tree. Default value: 5.
        Returns:
        this.

      • setEvaluator

        public NegamaxSearch.Builder setEvaluator(Evaluator evaluator)
        Parameters:
        evaluator - Function to use to evaluate the quality of nodes in the search tree once the depth limit is hit. Default value is an AgentEvaluator based on a MonteCarloSearch agent.
        Returns:
        this.
